I'm Jeremy Tuloup, from France, currently living in Sweden.

I do web and backend programming at Ubisoft Massive in Malmö Sweden on Just Dance Now.

This website focuses on the things I like to do as a hobby: game jams, fun projects, programming and experiments.

Enjoy.
